title: EPISTOLA Bill Solomon
html:
EPISTOLA Bill Solomon

...I'm inept at repartee but good at departee... It appeared some years ago in Saturday Review (Goodman Ace, maybe?).[Bill Solomon, Shawnee Mission, Kansas].
